scripts.roll: rm -rf nodejs/docs/* && rm -rf python/docs/* && rm -rf java/docs/* && rm -rf dotnet/docs/* && npm run sync-upstream-scripts && node src/generate.js
scripts.build-nodejs: npm run cleanup && cp -r nodejs/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/.bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build
scripts.build-python: npm run cleanup && cp -r python/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/.bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build/python
scripts.build-java: npm run cleanup && cp -r java/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/.bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build/java
scripts.build-dotnet: npm run cleanup && cp -r dotnet/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/.bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build/dotnet
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build-nodejs && npm run build-python && npm run build-java && npm run build-dotnet
scripts.version-dotnet: npm run prepare-dotnet && docusaurus docs:version $NEW_VERSION && cp -r docs/* dotnet/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* dotnet/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* dotnet/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json dotnet/
scripts.version-java: npm run prepare-java && docusaurus docs:version $NEW_VERSION && cp -r docs/* java/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* java/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* java/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json java/
scripts.version-node: npm run prepare-nodejs && docusaurus docs:version $NEW_VERSION && cp -r docs/* nodejs/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* nodejs/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* nodejs/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json nodejs/
scripts.version-python: npm run prepare-python && docusaurus docs:version $NEW_VERSION && cp -r docs/* python/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* python/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* python/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json python/
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf docs versioned_docs versioned_sidebars docusaurus.config.js versions.json sidebars.js
scripts.version-all: npm run version-python && npm run version-node && npm run version-java && npm run version-dotnet
